product_name: The North Face Ventana Quarter-Zip Top - Women's
long_description: The women's North Face Ventana Quarter-Zip is perfect for cool-weather activities. It's made from quick-drying, moisture-wicking fabric with FlashDry(TM) fibers to optimize temperature regulation. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, FlashDry fibers dramatically improve the fabric's dry time and breathability and won't wash out. Natural particles in FlashDry fabric resist odors. Polyester/elastane fabric blend has a comfortable amount of stretch to move with you when you're active. Strategically placed knit panels on the neck, down the upper back and under the arms allow good breathability to air out the places where you sweat the most. Thumbholes and flatlock seams enhance your comfort when wearing The North Face Ventana Quarter-Zip top.
short_description: The women's North Face Ventana Quarter-Zip is perfect for cool-weather activities. It's made from quick-drying, moisture-wicking fabric with FlashDry(TM) fibers to optimize temperature regulation.
